sourcesContent:
import React, { FormEvent, useState } from 'react' import { onLogin } from '../api/auth.api' import { useNavigation } from 'react-navi' const SignInForm: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const navigation = useNavigation() const [{ username, full_name, email, password }, setCredentials] = useState({ username: '', full_name: '', email: '', password: '', }) const [error, setError] = useState('') const login = async (event: FormEvent): Promise => { event.preventDefault() const { error, token } = await onLogin({ username, full_name, email, password, }) if (error) { setError(error) } else { await navigation.setContext({ token }) await navigation.navigate('/main') } } return (
setCredentials({ username: event.target.value, full_name, email, password })} type="text" className="flex-grow h-10 px-2 border rounded border-grey-400 focus:border-gray-700 focus:outline-none focus:shadow-outline" placeholder="Username" />
setCredentials({ username, full_name, email, password: event.target.value })} type="password" className="flex-grow h-10 px-2 rounded border border-grey-400 focus:border-gray-700 focus:outline-none focus:shadow-outline" placeholder="Password" />
Sign Up
{error.length > 0 && ( )}
) } export default SignInForm
